SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_waybill_items (split_goods_detail_id,plan_detail_id,waybill_id, goods_id, goods_name, sub_goods_id, goods_spec, unit, amount, receipt_amount, freight_price, freight_total,pay_price, pay_total, remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_date, is_deleted, company_id) values (#{splitGoodsDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{planDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{waybillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{receiptAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{freightPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{freightTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{payPrice,jdbcType=REAL},#{payTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},0, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update t_waybill_items set split_goods_detail_id = #{splitGoodsDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, plan_detail_id = #{planDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, waybill_id = #{waybillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_goods_id = #{subGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_spec = #{goodsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, receipt_amount = #{receiptAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, freight_price = #{freightPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, freight_total = #{freightTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, pay_price = #{payPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, pay_total = #{payTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id,split_goods_detail_id,plan_detail_id, waybill_id, goods_id, goods_name, sub_goods_id, goods_spec, unit, amount, receipt_amount, freight_price, freight_total, pay_price, pay_total,remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_date, is_deleted, company_id from t_waybill_items where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id,split_goods_detail_id,plan_detail_id, waybill_id, goods_id, goods_name, sub_goods_id, goods_spec, unit, amount, receipt_amount, freight_price, freight_total,pay_price, pay_total, remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_date, is_deleted, company_id from t_waybill_items
mapper.insert:
insert into t_waybill_items (split_goods_detail_id,plan_detail_id, waybill_id, goods_id, goods_name, sub_goods_id, goods_spec, unit, amount, receipt_amount, freight_price, freight_total,pay_price, pay_total, remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_date, is_deleted, company_id) values
(#{item.splitGoodsDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.planDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.waybillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.goodsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.receiptAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.freightPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.freightTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.payPrice,jdbcType=REAL},#{item.payTotal,jdbcType=REAL},#{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{item.updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 0, #{item.companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

update.foreach: update t_waybill_items set amount = #{tem.amount,jdbcType=REAL}, receipt_amount = #{tem.receiptAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, freight_price = #{tem.freightPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, freight_total = #{tem.freightTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, pay_price = #{tem.payPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, pay_total = #{tem.payTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, remark = #{tem.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_id = #{tem.updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{tem.updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: select id, split_goods_detail_id,plan_detail_id,waybill_id, goods_id, goods_name, sub_goods_id, goods_spec, unit, amount, receipt_amount, freight_price, freight_total,pay_price, pay_total, remark, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_date, is_deleted, company_id from t_waybill_items where waybill_id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
